divs: sighting details1. i am sleeping on my grand parents couch. there are 4 other adults asleep. i am 10 years old. suddenly i am sitting in my underwear on a curb across from a large field 4 blocks from the house. i wake up and sit stunned for probably 5-10 minutes suddenly a car drives by and honks nd i realize this is not a dream. i run home to find everyone outside looking for me for the past hour! the next morning strangely no one talks about the incident. 2. my parents and myself and 3 sisters are on our way to niagra falls ny family vacation. we` are only 20 miles from the falls at 930 at night-1030we are all very excited and wide awake! suddenly we are on a dirt road, a back road in a forest. we are all waking up and disoriented. my parents ask each other where are we and how did we get here? how do we find our way out of this place . it is now 2am! the next day no one speaks of this! 3. i am in canada at my grandparents cottage on lake erie. it is 1am and my friend gary and i are in twin beds talking away. suddenly he says that something not someone is in the room. i tell him i feel it too and that i am scared. the next thing we wake up as the son comes up and we do not discuss it for several days until i start to remember bits and peices... 4 one time i had a strange mark\burn on my stomach while at the drs i asked him to inspwect it. he looked and got another dr to take a look. he said , not smiling or laughing...it looks like another one of those alien abduction marks! i was stunned. he said that it was a burn and there was no way that i would not feel something that large n deep! 5. my mother was pregnant 9 times and on 4 pregnancies she just woke up no longer pregnat after supposedly reachuing the 4 th month. always in the 4th month no discharge or fetus just an empty womb..
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around June 10th 1966
Summary: 5 separate missing time instances several with more than just myself 1 time entire family 6 people!
